item.title: Why Is SRPT Stock Falling Today?
item.description: Sarepta Therapeutics announced a debt refinancing plan totaling about $291 million.

item.title: Coinbase Taps Chainlink To Secure $7 Billion Portfolio Of Wrapped Assets Amid DEX Trading Expansion
item.description: The partnership covers cbBTC, cbETH, cbDOGE, cbLTC, cbADA, and cbXRP, which have a combined asset value of around $7 billion.

item.title: RZLT Stock Lost Nearly 90% Of Its Value Today – What Did The Company’s Latest Trial Reveal?
item.description: Rezolute said that its Phase 3 sunRIZE trial of ersodetug to treat low blood pressure failed to meet its primary endpoint.

item.title: Spot Silver Continues Hitting Fresh Highs – But This Analyst Warns Of Potential Consolidation
item.description: Spot silver prices jumped to a record high of $62.9 per ounce on Thursday, a day after the U.S. Federal Reserve announced the much-anticipated 25 basi...

item.title: Petmed Express Stock Jumps On Buyout Offer From Largest Shareholder SilverCape Investments
item.description: The company said the deal would be funded with cash on hand at SilverCape and would not be subject to any financing conditions or contingencies.
